text:
Question 159) A tap was not closed correctly and dripped from midnight to six o'clock in the morning, with the frequency of one drop every three seconds. Each drop of water is known to have a volume of 0.2 ml.
What was the closest value of the total water wasted during this period in liters?
A) 0.2
B) 1.2
C) 1.4
D) 12.9
E) 64.8
